verses.roman:
nityānanda dekhiyā prabhura bhāvāveśa
nikaṭe nā āise, rahe kichu dūra-deśa

synonyms: nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda; dekhiyā—seeing; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhāva-āveśa—the ecstatic love; nikaṭe—nearby; nā āise—does not come; rahe—keeps; kichu—a little; dūra-deśa—far away.
translation: Seeing the ecstatic love of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, Nityānanda Prabhu did not approach but remained a little distance away.
